= Terms =

 * [http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/terms/samplingProtocol samplingProtocol]
 * [http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/terms/samplingEffort samplingEffort]

= Recommendations =

samplingProtocol is the name of, reference to, or description of the method or protocol used during an Event.

samplingEffort is the amount of effort expended during an Event.

If values are not provided for these terms...

|| *samplingProtocol* || *samplingEffort* ||
